data.name: First Men´s Life
data.detailed_description:
In the game "FIRST MEN´S LIFE" you wake up on a beautiful open world map in the middle of nowhere. It's practically a matter of surviving yourself. You can create your own house with the integrated building system. Eating is of course also important, which is why you also have to take care of foods such as fruit, vegetables, meat and fish. There are also opponents in the game who can pose a real challenge.



In "FIRST MEN´S LIFE" you start with a stone in your hand. The first thing you have to do is find something to eat so that you don't lose hearts. Once you have done that, you should cut down the first trees in order to be well prepared for the first night. After the first night, you can go on a discovery tour. You discover new biomes, forests, lakes and much more. After a certain time you will meet the first opponents who only want evil. So that you can defeat them, you should be well armed in advance.

What FIRST MEN´S LIFE offers


  • try to survive- Build your own things
  • Produce and cook food yourself
  • many unlockable game objects
  • Eliminate opponents
  • Diversity of biomes
  • Breathtaking graphics

What FIRST MEN´S LIFE doesn't offer


  • Multiplayer
  • Creative Mode
  • Serious violence
  • trade



FIRST MEN'S LIFE is developed by a pupil from Hamburg. I'm in the 11th grade and develop this game as an annual work. Game development has been a hobby of mine for years. In the future I would like to develop other small, complex and high-quality indie / adventure games.

I look forward to constructive feedback of all kinds, so feel free to get in touch! I will do my best to be able to reply to messages as quickly as possible so that I can fix problems in the game quickly.

data.short_description: Create your own world! Build, fight, farm and explore the open world map in a relaxed way!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: not necessary
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Quad Core 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: not necessary
